summary: Millions of U.S. families include a child or parent with a disability. We reported that certain agencies have resources to help, but many parents are unaware of them. This is an "Easy Read" version of our report. Easy Read is a way some groups make their written information easier to understand. For example, Easy Read documents use short sentences and plain language. They also put...
title: SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL FOR GAO-24-106843: Strengthening Federal Government Coordination to Help Families with Disabilities Access Child Care
